name: ARS Fan Tokens
description: ARS is a functional token that provides fans of Arsenal Football Club (Arsenal F.C., Arsenal) with a tokenized share of the club's decisions through the use of apps and services. ARS supports a blockchain-based fan interaction and reward platform for the sports and entertainment industries. ARS is mainly used in the following areas: governance: ARS holders can vote on various binding "fan decisions" issued by Arsenal through smart contracts. Rewards: ARS holders can participate in activities to receive rewards and daily fixed dividends (USDT). Token mortgage: in the future, ARS can be mortgaged to earn a non-homogeneous token (NFT) reward.
